${modID}:AbsolutePowerPower.NAME: Absolute Power
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%s [E] every time an attack's damage ends in a 9.

${modID}:PleadedPower.NAME: Pleaded
DESCRIPTIONS: #yAttacks deal #b%s less damage for their ${modID}:LV_Enemy for #b%s turn.
#yAttacks deal #b%s less damage for their ${modID}:LV_Enemy for #b%s turns.

${modID}:PreventLVLoss.NAME: Prevent LV Loss
DESCRIPTIONS: Prevent the next #b%s time you would lose ${modID}:LV_Hero.
Prevent the next #b%s times you would lose ${modID}:LV_Hero.
